title: ScaleUp Event & Exhibition Website

overview.description: A dynamic website for ScaleUp Event & Exhibition to enhance lead generation and audience engagement
overview.details: Developed a dynamic, high-performance website for ScaleUp Event & Exhibition, focusing on lead generation, content management, and visual appeal. The website includes a content management system for blogs and event updates, hosted on AWS App Runner for seamless scalability and deployment, ensuring optimal performance during high traffic periods.

features: Lead generation-focused design to capture event registrations and inquiries
Content management system (CMS) for event updates, blogs, and announcements
SEO-enhanced features for improved search engine visibility
Responsive and visually engaging UI for a better user experience
High availability, scalability, and performance optimized through AWS App Runner
